body:
@kostya-sh Thank you!

> You use int64 for scale, I don't think this will work on 32-bit architectures.

 Could you elaborate why? If there are issues (I haven't tested on 32-bit platforms yet) using `int` would probably work fine.

> I think some methods are unnecessary, like Fib or Binomial. I would use a big.Int-based library for them.

I added Fib (and, obviously, FizzBuzz) just for the fun of it :smile: 

> MarshalJSON and UnmarshalJSON are not needed. MarshalText/UnmarshalText are enough

I  still need to nail down this part of the library, although it should be easy enough.
